creator.organizationName: University of Rostock, Biological Station Zingst, Mühlenstraße 27, D 18374 Zingst

section.para: Data set contains weather data of Zingst. Data are sampled daily at 8:00. Data are given as monthly medians. The data of 2011 and 2012 are contributed to the EnvEurope project (action 5). Solar radiation, wind speed and direction are available, but are not ready yet (calculation from continuous measurements not ready).

section.title: Dataset access and use constraints
section.para: Principal:Research has granted a permission of type:Free for access and use upon request
Principal:EnvEurope (LTER-Europe) has granted a permission of type:Free for access and use upon request
The data provider must be offered co-authorship for publications using this dataset at least within the metadata description
Formal acknowledgement of the dataset providers
The opportunity to collaborate on the project using the dataset
The opportunity to review the results based on the dataset
Reprints of articles using the dataset must be provided to the data provider

methodStep.instrumentation: solar radiation: pyranometer CM 11 (Kipp and Zonen, Delft), every 10 min for 30 sec averagedpecipiation sampled every 24 hwind speed: measured every 10 min for 30 s with an anemometer-compact of THIES CLIMA with a measurement range of 0.5 to 50 m s-1 and a sensitivity of ± 0.5 m s-1 at 10 m above ground

section.para: Precipitation is sampled daily. Snow is included. Radiation and wind are measured every 10 min. Analog signals are converted by AD changers. Data are recorded in LabView and exported as monthly text files.
